com.sc.hm.otl.core

Interface OTLSpan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.opentracing.Span
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OTLSpanImpl

    public interface OTLSpan
extends io.opentracing.Span
    OTL span. It extends the characteristic of opentracing span and provides some additional behavior.
    Author:
    Sudiptasish Chanda

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long endTime()
      Return the end time of the span in microseconds.
      boolean ignoreActive()
      Indicate whether the span activation to be ignored.
      String operation()
      Return the operation name.
      String parentSpanId()
      Convenient method to get the parent span id.
      List<OTLReference> references()
      Return the references.
      long startTime()
      Return the start time of the span in microseconds.
      Map<String,Object> tags()
      Return the tags.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.opentracing.Span
